entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Maniwaki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: S 31 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
